message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth a substantial amount. While I can't disclose the exact value to you, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1500000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a significant opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a potentially favorable price. Please consider this offer carefully. If you decline, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay $1500000.
